Uses of Class
vector2d.Vector2D

    • Uses of Vector2D in vector2d

      Methods in vector2d that return Vector2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2D Vector2D.add(Vector2D v)
      The addition of one vector to another produces a third vector.
      Vector2D Vector2D.rotate(double angle)
      If we think of a vector as an arrow rooted at the origin, then we can imagine rotating it like the hand on a clock.
      Vector2D Vector2D.rotateScaleTranslate(double angle, double scaleX, double scaleY, double deltaX, double deltaY)
      We will often want to rotate, scale, and translate (move) a vector in that order.
      Vector2D Vector2D.scale(double factor)
      We will often want to stretch a vector the same amount in the horizontal and vertical directions.
      Vector2D Vector2D.scale(double xFactor, double yFactor)
      Multiplication of the components of a vector stretches the vector.
      Methods in vector2d with parameters of type Vector2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2D Vector2D.add(Vector2D v)
      The addition of one vector to another produces a third vector.
      double Vector2D.dot(Vector2D v)
      The dot product of this vector with another vector gives us a number.
